titleStmt.title: The tryal and condemnation of two popish priests, Andrew Brommich and William Atkyns, for high treason at Stafford assizes, August 16, 1679 with an account of the notable equivocation of some witnesses of the Romish Church there produced, and the reason thereof from their own authors : Mr. Stephen Dugdale, one of the grand evidences of the Popish plot being there present.
titleStmt.author: Bromwich, Andrew, defendant.
Atkins, William, 1601-1681, defendant.
Dugdale, Stephen, 1640?-1683.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
